metadata.title: CVE-2023-0437 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: When calling bson_utf8_validate on some inputs a loop with an exitcondition that cannot be reached may occur, i.e. an infinite loop. Thisissue affects All MongoDB C Driver versions prior to versions 1.25.0.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
